data.name: ClownWorld

data.description:
A community to post dank memes. Don't associate us with r/dankmemes. 

---
---

##### Rules:

---

**1. Memes only**  

 - No political posts/propaganda
 - No "meme numbers"/no meme captions in titles
 - No screenshots
 - No images without a caption, unless they are edited

**See our [pinned post](https://ruqq.us/wne) for more**

---

**2. Do not incite violence**

 - Do not threaten users with irl violence.

---

**3. Don't spam**

No one likes those who spam. Don't do any of the following:

 - Flood the guild with off-topic / rule-breaking posts
 - Repost the same or very similar meme over and over again
 - Send multiple memes with the same joke/puchline

---

**4. Only use the approved image hosts**

The list of approved image hosts can be found [here](https://ruqqus.com/info/image_hosts).

---

**5. Don't repost**

Check for duplicates! Do not post memes that have been already posted in the guild. 

---
---

Guild banner by @DM_WarMuse
data.description_html:
A community to post dank memes. Don't associate us with r/dankmemes.

Rules:

1. Memes only

  • No political posts/propaganda
  • No "meme numbers"/no meme captions in titles
  • No screenshots
  • No images without a caption, unless they are edited

See our pinned post for more

2. Do not incite violence

  • Do not threaten users with irl violence.

3. Don't spam

No one likes those who spam. Don't do any of the following:

  • Flood the guild with off-topic / rule-breaking posts
  • Repost the same or very similar meme over and over again
  • Send multiple memes with the same joke/puchline

4. Only use the approved image hosts

The list of approved image hosts can be found here.

5. Don't repost

Check for duplicates! Do not post memes that have been already posted in the guild.

Guild banner by @Dm_WarMuse

data.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

üíª No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

üü™ Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

üì¨ No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

üòÄ Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don‚Äôt be a jerk.

üìú Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

data.name: AskRuqqus

data.description:
Got a burning unpopular fact you want to share? Spark some discussions!

Interested in becoming a GM? Message @HeroicMessage_000 over on +Internet_Elves

We love facts here. Unpopular AND unknown facts are welcome.

Rules: 
1) Clarify in the title between [] brackets where, when, why, who and/or how your fact is unpopular. For example, "[Unpopular in Leftism] Leftists use most of their words like slurs."
2) No pissing contests about what is and isn't popular. Not everyone has the same experience; it is subjective. 
3) Topic must be facts, obviously. 
4) Proof is not necessary but appreciated. 

"Flair" your post by including one or more of the following in your title: 
[Unpopular in Leftism]
[Unpopular in Rightism]
[Unpopular in Liberalism]
[Unpopular in Conservatism]
[Unpopular in Communism]
[Unpopular in Capitalism]
[Unpopular]
[Unpopular in Renown]
[Serious Discussion]
[Casual Discussion]
[Meta]
[Request]
[Other]
data.description_html:
Got a burning unpopular fact you want to share? Spark some discussions!

Interested in becoming a GM? Message @HeroicMessage_000 over on +Internet_Elves

We love facts here. Unpopular AND unknown facts are welcome.

Rules:

  1. Clarify in the title between [] brackets where, when, why, who and/or how your fact is unpopular. For example, "[Unpopular in Leftism] Leftists use most of their words like slurs."
  2. No pissing contests about what is and isn't popular. Not everyone has the same experience; it is subjective.
  3. Topic must be facts, obviously.
  4. Proof is not necessary but appreciated.

"Flair" your post by including one or more of the following in your title: [Unpopular in Leftism] [Unpopular in Rightism] [Unpopular in Liberalism] [Unpopular in Conservatism] [Unpopular in Communism] [Unpopular in Capitalism] [Unpopular] [Unpopular in Renown] [Serious Discussion] [Casual Discussion] [Meta] [Request] [Other]

data.name: Conspiracy

data.description:
This guild is about News far and wide!

Sister guild: +Commentary

#1. Things that are posted to News should be stated like a fact in the Headline.

In the sense, Headline: X happened or X said this. Not Personal opinions. 

They should be reporting.

#2. Personal slant or commentary should go in the comments, not the Headline. Commentary content (like discussion commentator shows) are not News. Commentary content will be redirected to +Commentary which is for that purpose. 

If it's News but is more an opinion piece please add [Opinion] in the title, or post in a topic specific guild. 

#3. No screenshots; provide a link, provide a source.

See Posting Etiquette pin for further explanation.
data.description_html:
This guild is about News far and wide!

Sister guild: +Commentary

#1. Things that are posted to News should be stated like a fact in the Headline.

In the sense, Headline: X happened or X said this. Not Personal opinions.

They should be reporting.

#2. Personal slant or commentary should go in the comments, not the Headline. Commentary content (like discussion commentator shows) are not News. Commentary content will be redirected to +Commentary which is for that purpose.

If it's News but is more an opinion piece please add [Opinion] in the title, or post in a topic specific guild.

#3. No screenshots; provide a link, provide a source.

See Posting Etiquette pin for further explanation.
